price: 75. En er is niets in de hemelen of op aarde verborgen, of het staat in een duidelijk Boek.
arabic: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
